text:
e="preserve">Elba Perez-Cinciarelli (July 27, 1943 – July 3, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. She was in the New Jersey General Assembly from the 31st Legislative District from 2002 to 2004. She was born in Puerto Rico, but raised in New York City.
Perez-Cinciarelli died on July 3, 2020 in Secaucus, New Jersey, at age 76.
